page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.....
page.content:
Mark Bacon is a school boy at the village school at WORTHEN. He is ten years old.
I get up and go to the bathroom and have a wash. I go back to my bedroom get dressed and go down stairs and have my Weetabix. I sit by the television for about 30 mins. Time for school I get in the car and we go to school. We have about 15 mins play. We do maths after we have had a service. We have a playtime at 10.30. After play we have English and then it's dinner time. I have another play. We come in from that play I do some reading for 15 mins and we do something else. We have another play after 1 hour 15 mins then we do our Domesday project.Home time,I get my things and go to the steps of the school to see if my mum is there. I go
